summary: The diff implements a frontend Mission Log page (REQ-3) with today's summary statistics, but completely lacks the core backend automation requirements (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-4). There is no midnight timer mechanism, no automated mission log creation, no persistent historical log data structure, and no enhanced AI task generation logic based on user patterns.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement a daily timer mechanism that triggers at midnight (00:00:00 local time) to automatically generate new AI-recommended daily tasks
missing_requirements.reason: No timer implementation found in backend/main.mo. While Timer is imported, there is no timer setup, no midnight trigger logic, no timezone handling, and no automatic task generation invocation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create automated mission log entries at midnight that record daily activity summaries including completed tasks, missions accomplished, XP gained, and coins earned for that day
missing_requirements.reason: No mission log data structure, no automated log entry creation at midnight, no persistent storage for daily summaries, and no historical log retrieval mechanism implemented in the backend.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enhance the AI task generation logic to consider user's historical completion patterns, time of day preferences, and previously completed tasks to provide more personalized daily recommendations
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of AI task generation enhancement. No logic analyzing taskCompletionLog, no pattern recognition based on completion success rates, no repetition avoidance logic, and no difficulty scaling based on user level.

hallucinated_features.description: Mission Log page displays today's real-time statistics calculated from current dailyTasks data
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 specifies displaying 'all automated daily log entries' with historical data in reverse chronological order. The implementation only shows today's live calculated stats, not persistent historical log entries as required by REQ-2.
